lines.text:
[to his son, Hartzell]
A pastor's family are in a special category. We are uh... Well, It's as if we walked a sort of tightrope. Balancing with one foot on earth and one foot already in heaven.

[upon his new found enlightenment about motion pictures]
He who speaks to only one generation is already dead. And he who listens to only one generation is deaf.
